29#if HAVE_NBTOOL_CONFIG_H
30# include "nbtool_config.h"
31#endif
32
33#include <sys/cdefs.h>
34
35#include <assert.h>
36#include <libelf.h>
37
38#include "_libelf.h"
39
40__RCSID("$NetBSD: libelf_extended.c,v 1.3 2016/02/20 02:43:42 christos Exp $");
41ELFTC_VCSID("Id: libelf_extended.c 3174 2015-03-27 17:13:41Z emaste ");
42
43/*
44 * Retrieve section #0, allocating a new section if needed.
45 */
46static Elf_Scn *
47_libelf_getscn0(Elf *e)
48{
49 Elf_Scn *s;
50
51 if ((s = STAILQ_FIRST(&e->e_u.e_elf.e_scn)) != NULL)
52 return (s);
53
54 return (_libelf_allocate_scn(e, (size_t) SHN_UNDEF));
55}
56
57int
58_libelf_setshnum(Elf *e, void *eh, int ec, size_t shnum)
59{
60 Elf_Scn *scn;
61
62 if (shnum >= SHN_LORESERVE) {
63 if ((scn = _libelf_getscn0(e)) == NULL)
64 return (0);
65
66 assert(scn->s_ndx == SHN_UNDEF);
67
68 if (ec == ELFCLASS32)
69 scn->s_shdr.s_shdr32.sh_size = shnum;
70 else
71 scn->s_shdr.s_shdr64.sh_size = shnum;
72
73 (void) elf_flagshdr(scn, ELF_C_SET, ELF_F_DIRTY);
74
75 shnum = 0;
76 }
77
78 if (ec == ELFCLASS32)
79 ((Elf32_Ehdr *) eh)->e_shnum = shnum & 0xFFFFU;
80 else
81 ((Elf64_Ehdr *) eh)->e_shnum = shnum & 0xFFFFU;
82
83
84 return (1);
85}
86
87int
88_libelf_setshstrndx(Elf *e, void *eh, int ec, size_t shstrndx)
89{
90 Elf_Scn *scn;
91
92 if (shstrndx >= SHN_LORESERVE) {
93 if ((scn = _libelf_getscn0(e)) == NULL)
94 return (0);
95
96 assert(scn->s_ndx == SHN_UNDEF);
97
98 if (ec == ELFCLASS32)
99 scn->s_shdr.s_shdr32.sh_link = shstrndx;
100 else
101 scn->s_shdr.s_shdr64.sh_link = shstrndx;
102
103 (void) elf_flagshdr(scn, ELF_C_SET, ELF_F_DIRTY);
104
105 shstrndx = SHN_XINDEX;
106 }
107
108 if (ec == ELFCLASS32)
109 ((Elf32_Ehdr *) eh)->e_shstrndx = shstrndx & 0xFFFFU;
110 else
111 ((Elf64_Ehdr *) eh)->e_shstrndx = shstrndx & 0xFFFFU;
112
113 return (1);
114}
115
116int
117_libelf_setphnum(Elf *e, void *eh, int ec, size_t phnum)
118{
119 Elf_Scn *scn;
120
121 if (phnum >= PN_XNUM) {
122 if ((scn = _libelf_getscn0(e)) == NULL)
123 return (0);
124
125 assert(scn->s_ndx == SHN_UNDEF);
126
127 if (ec == ELFCLASS32)
128 scn->s_shdr.s_shdr32.sh_info = phnum;
129 else
130 scn->s_shdr.s_shdr64.sh_info = phnum;
131
132 (void) elf_flagshdr(scn, ELF_C_SET, ELF_F_DIRTY);
133
134 phnum = PN_XNUM;
135 }
136
137 if (ec == ELFCLASS32)
138 ((Elf32_Ehdr *) eh)->e_phnum = phnum & 0xFFFFU;
139 else
140 ((Elf64_Ehdr *) eh)->e_phnum = phnum & 0xFFFFU;
141
142 return (1);
143}
